element.name: TDetailledTreeView
element.short: Shows Details of a tree view node in a linked list view
element.descr: If the property ListView points to a list view, the list view is filled with the child nodes of the selected tree node.

element.name: TDetailledTreeView.ListView
element.short: points to a list for details about the selected tree node
element.descr: The list view ist filled with the child node names of the selected tree node by default.
